title: Bloomberg Markets: Ford to Build Focus in China
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Ford to Build Focus in China
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: David Welch Detroit Bureau Chief Bloomberg Editorial Discussing Ford to save $1 billion by moving production of Focus from Mexico to China and Tesla said close to agreeing on plan for China production.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
